title: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details
20020212a.

Mnemonics

No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for super class), so it could be done.

At least isValidTypeName

The label could say 'Select destination type:'
OB: The bug report does not mention the observed behavior.
EB:
I would use the title for 'Move static field(s)' and use the description for 'x fields from xx'.

Selection dialog should be initialized with the type currently entered.
SR: Browse offers me a type from a CU in a different project.
